name: UNLIMITED IRON CREATOR
description: A comprehensive AI multimedia generation framework with Streamlit interface. Generate text, images, audio, and video content with AI - no limits on creativity!

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key for text and image generation (optional - app works without it)

ELEVENLABS_API_KEY.description: ElevenLabs API key for audio generation (optional)

STABILITY_API_KEY.description: Stability AI API key for image generation (optional)
